vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Included with: ἀναντί-ρρητος, ον,
not to be opposed, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; undeniable, [NT+2nd c.AD+]. adverb -τως without opposition, by consent, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; incontrovertibly, [Refs 6th c.AD+]; without gainsaying, [NT]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 還, 因, 作, 為
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 还, 因, 作, 为

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
without raising any objection, indisputable
primarily without contradiction or gainsaying, raising objection; without hesitation, promptly, Acts 10:29*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không phản đối; không mâu thuẫn
